name: Heartless Deal
description:
Heartless Deal is a visual novel made for Ludum Dare 44.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/heartless-deal

It's a story about a person who sold its soul to a demon and try to get it back by playing a game with a bored demon.

The game features :

- A fantasy storyline about love and death

- Original Art

-Available for Windows

**Update 1.1 : **

-Minor text corrections

-Minor changes in animations
